overview: Nothing can keep you down. No man. No woman. Not even a mulleted ex who feeds you diet pills and calls you a loser. Thus begins Spandex the Musical, a tubuleric show for anyone stretching towards their dreams. Lorraine Stubenski was the favorite to win gold in the Olympics, but she toppled off the balance beam and never competed again. Enter fitness guru and love interest Dov Yisrael. In this authentic music video from (1986 Billboard Top 1 million), Dov & his unit teach America how to ‘make aerobics’ through one simple thought: your body is your temple. It’s a metaphor.
title: My Body Is My Temple
